function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious diseases propagation due to group-level analysis","Impact":"Ineffective individual-level conclusions and ecological fallacies","Mitigation":"Conduct additional individual-level studies to supplement group-level analysis","Technologies":"Health data analytics, individual tracking technologies","People":"Population of the 401 German counties","Owner":"Health authorities, research institutions"},{"Description":"Influence of factors at the group level differing from individual level","Impact":"Misinterpretation of data and ineffective measures","Mitigation":"Validation of group-level findings with individual-level studies","Technologies":"Data integration and analysis tools","People":"Policy makers, public health officials","Owner":"Data analysts, researchers"},{"Description":"Low socioeconomic status as a risk factor for contagious diseases","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to COVID-19 and other diseases","Mitigation":"Implement targeted public health interventions for vulnerable populations","Technologies":"Health tracking and monitoring systems","People":"Low socioeconomic status individuals","Owner":"Public health agencies, social welfare organizations"}]}
